dt: {bc}the act or process of {d_link|orienting|orient:1} or of being oriented

dt.t: These materials are for the {wi}orientation{/wi} of new employees.
the {wi}orientation{/wi} of the main altar of the church

dt: {bc}a usually general or lasting direction of thought, inclination, or interest

dt.t: the fundamentally human {wi}orientation{/wi} of Greek art
This company has a decidedly conservative {wi}orientation{/wi}.

dt: {bc}a person's sexual identity or self-identification as bisexual, straight, gay, lesbian, pansexual, etc. {bc}the state of being bisexual, straight, gay, lesbian, pansexual, etc. {bc}{sx|sexual orientation||}
{bc}change of position by organs, {d_link|organelles|organelle}, or organisms in response to external stimulus

shortdef: the act or process of orienting or of being oriented
the state of being oriented; broadly : arrangement, alignment
a usually general or lasting direction of thought, inclination, or interest

dt: {bc}a person's sexual identity or self-identification as bisexual, straight, gay, pansexual, etc. {bc}the state of being bisexual, straight, gay, pansexual, etc.

dt.t: Last summer a proposal submitted to Family Dollar Stores … persuaded the company's board to adopt a policy prohibiting discrimination based on {wi}sexual orientation{/wi} or {d_link|gender identity|gender identity}.
Liberace went to extraordinary lengths to hide his {wi}sexual orientation{/wi} from the public.

shortdef: a person's sexual identity or self-identification as bisexual, straight, gay, pansexual, etc. : the state of being bisexual, straight, gay, pansexual, etc.
